title: The Cup that cheers
creator_credit: M. Bhavnani, Documentary Films of India and K Khandpur
brief_description: The story of the Indian tea industry which gives employment to about one million workers. Illustrates the various processes involved in its cultivation, manufacture, marketing and exports.
